segments.text: I find myself shaking my head at this whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The level of inattention in this kitchen is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, blissfully unaware of the rising flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a puddle, yet she continues to polish that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely detached.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are engaging in outright dangerous behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That wobbly stool is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could easily break something or get hurt, and she wouldn't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the serene garden and this internal chaos is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights a deeper neglect, perhaps, than just spilled water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene just screams "accident waiting to happen."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so preventable, yet no one is preventing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of exasperation watching it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
